span.strong: WELCOME TO THE COVID 2020 SURVIVAL PAGE

div.p: ► Southland Prom has been cancelled. While we understand that prom is a big event, in order to keep everyone healthy and to comply with government mandates, the prom is officially cancelled.
Adventures in Familyhood - 20 virtual field trips to take with your kids
Lightbox - videos, online books, printable activities and more
Khan Academy – online books, games, activities, podcasts

TexQuest – online newspaper, magazines, books, games, videos
Username: j085903
Password: learn
Pisan Academy – videod with what to do with your children while schools are closed
Lubbock ISD – Our good friends at LISD have created this site for area schools to use during this unusual time.

POST – Post ISD will be providing meals to our students who live in Post. Parents need to fill out the online survey that is on the Post ISD webpage. You will need to fill out the part about delivered meals and put your address in the space provided. This will get you added to the routes, which will start delivering on Monday. The Post ISD website will have information about times for delivery.
If there are questions, they can call 806-495-3343 and ask for Superintendent Dickson.
SLATON – Slaton ISD will be providing meals to our students who live in Slaton. Information can be found on the Slaton ISD website.
LUBBOCK – Students who reside in Lubbock can pick up meals through Lubbock ISD.
